uri.description: URI for the file e.g. https://opensnp.org/data/60.23andme-exome-vcf.231?1341012444 or drs://seqslab.net/id
uri.title: URI

key.title: Individual
key.description: The values must correspond to the Individual::ID for the individuals in the message.

value.title: File identifier
value.description: The values must map to the samples in the file.

individual_to_file_identifiers.description: Map of identifiers mapping an individual to a sample in the file. The key values must correspond to the Individual::id for the individuals in the message, the values must map to the samples in the file.

file_attribute.description: A map of attributes pertaining to the file or its contents.
